SELECT distOrg.PN2, distOrg.PN3, distOrg.PN4, distGeo.PN2,distGeo.PN3,distGeo.PN4, dist.DIST_CODE, dist.DIST_NAME, storeOrg.PN2, storeOrg.PN3, storeOrg.PN4, storeGeo.PN2,storeGeo.PN3,storeGeo.PN4, CASE WHEN store.STORE_CODE IS NULL THEN 'O'+data.STORE_CODE ELSE store.STORE_CODE END AS STORE_CODE, store.STORE_NAME, storeCorp.ITEM_NAME, storeType.ITEM_NAME, prod.PROD_CODE, prod.PROD_NAME, prodType.ITEM_NAME, prodBrand.ITEM_NAME, data.BILL_DATE, data.BOX, data.TON, data.PROD_QUANTITY*data.PROD_PRICE, data.GROSS_SALES
FROM rpt_data_sale data --产品 inner join mdm_product prod on prod.PROD_CODE=data.TARGET_PROD_CODE left join base_dict_item prodType on prod.TYPE_ID=prodType.DICT_ITEM_ID AND prodType.DICT_ID='prodType' left join base_dict_item prodBrand on prod.BRAND_ID=prodBrand.DICT_ITEM_ID AND prodBrand.DICT_ID='prodBrand' --门店 left join mdm_store store on store.STORE_CODE=data.TARGET_STORE_CODE left join base_dict_item storeCorp on store.CORP_ID=storeCorp.DICT_ITEM_ID AND storeCorp.DICT_ID='storeCorp' left join base_dict_item storeType on store.TYPE_ID=storeType.DICT_ITEM_ID AND storeType.DICT_ID='storeType' --门店组织 left join base_org storeOrg on storeOrg.ORG_ID=store.ORG_ID --门店地理 left join base_dict_item storeGeo on store.GEO_ID=storeGeo.DICT_ITEM_ID AND storeGeo.DICT_ID='geography' --客户端、经销商 inner join dms_client client on data.CLIENT_ID=client.CLIENT_ID inner join mdm_distributor dist on client.DIST_ID=dist.DIST_ID --经销商组织 left join base_org distOrg on distOrg.ORG_ID=dist.ORG_ID --经销商地理 left join base_dict_item distGeo on dist.GEO_ID=distGeo.DICT_ITEM_ID AND distGeo.DICT_ID='geography'
WHERE 1=1 $ge_billDate$ $le_billDate$ $orgId$ $geoId$ $distId$ $distCode$ $sisName$ $sisCode$ $natureId$ $corpId$ $typeId$ $prodName$ $prodCode$ $categoryId$ $brandId$
